text: Karla Kardashian is back. Ellen DeGeneres, 59, returned as forgotten Kardashian sister'Karla'on Wednesday for her Halloween episode, this time sporting a huge prosthetic baby bump as part of the costume. She was joined by Kourtney Kardashian, 38, and Kendall Jenner, 21, for the skit, as well as comedian Jay Pharoah, 30, playing Karla's baby daddy and Shaq's'cousin'Jaleel O'Neal.
